Granite Tomb Records

The home of the most brutal and uncompromising bands in the scene since 20XX

About Us

Founded in the underground, Diamond Noise has grown to become one of the most respected booking agencies in extreme metal. We work with the most brutal and uncompromising bands in the scene.

Our team of dedicated metalheads has over 50 years combined experience organizing tours, festivals, and one-off events across the globe.

From small club shows to major festivals, we handle all aspects of tour booking, promotion, and logistics to ensure the most devastating performances possible.

Our Services

  • ✓ Worldwide tour booking
  • ✓ Festival placement
  • ✓ Tour management
  • ✓ Merchandise coordination
  • ✓ Visa & travel logistics
